participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous with a love for family and creativity.
participant_1.background: My heart is full of love for my family and friends. I want to live somewhere where I can wear purple all the time and listen to Iron Maiden as loud as I want. I took my dogs on a hike in the mountains. I love kids. My favorite season is winter.

participant_2.name: Chris
participant_2.personality: Supportive and family-oriented, with a passion for teaching and sports.
participant_2.background: I'd brag to my friends that I always have their backs, no matter what. I used to be a teacher, but I wanted to spend more time with my family. I'm deathly terrified of heights. I love dogs and cats. I spend every waking hour I can at the archery center.

content.text: Hey, I'm Sarah! What's your name?
I'm Chris, it's nice to meet you Sarah! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go hiking with my dogs, and I also love listening to heavy metal music.
Oh cool! I love dogs too, but I'm terrified of heights so I don't do much hiking. I do spend a lot of time at the archery center though.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to shoot a bow and arrow.
It's really fun, you should give it a try!
Maybe I will, thanks for the suggestion!
Of course! So, what do you do for work?
I'm a customer service representative for a telecommunications company.
Oh cool, I used to be a teacher but I quit to spend more time with my family.
That's awesome! I love working with people, so being a customer service representative is a great fit for me.
I'm sure it is! So, what's your favorite color?
My favorite color is purple! I love how it's so bold and unique.
Purple is a great color! I love the way it looks with black.
Me too! I love to wear all black and then add a pop of purple with my accessories.
That sounds really cool! I'm more of a minimalist when it comes to my style.
That's cool too! I like to mix it up every once in a while.
Me too! So, what are your plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet, I might go hiking with my dogs or just relax at home.
Sounds like a good plan! I'm going to spend some time with my family and then go to the archery center on Sunday.
That sounds fun! I hope you have a great time.
